data.title: Private Equity Investing
data.meta_description: With 50 years of private equity investment experience, we have a robust knowledge of the PE landscape coupled with deep global networks.
data.text:
The complexity and scope of the private equity opportunity set—and the importance of finding and investing with the limited universe of managers who can deliver outperformance—requires extensive resources, strong networks, and specialized expertise.

*As of December 31, 2023.
